title: removed ticket?
body: I needed help with my account so I wrote a support ticket, I got the email saying they got the request, but when I open the link they provided it says the page doesn't exist/was moved bla bla bla. Do I need to resubmit or should I just wait?

replies.body:
Weeeeeiiiiiiird.....I tried pulling up your ticket on our end and I'm not able to see any from this account. If you sent the ticket under a different account, shoot me that summoner name or the ticket number and I can check for it again.

With that being said, you can still try to respond to your ticket by just replying to the email you got. If that doesn't work and this is the account you sent the ticket from, go ahead and shoot us another [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
